tldr: Affected versions of this package incorrectly use the `APIKey` as the signature key in the `VerifyWebhookSignature` method instead of the intended `WebhookSigningKey`. This misconfiguration weakens the security of webhook verification, potentially allowing attackers to bypass signature checks and send unauthorized requests.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `github.com/mailgun/mailgun-go/v4` library to the patch version.
